text: @BorisJohnson Unless your name is Dominic Cummings. Guidelines clearly broken. What is even more worrying about the statement is a man, suspecting that he has coronavirus, thinks it is safer to drive 250 miles to his elderly parents than to stay at home. Clearly unfit to make judgments for UK
